text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    HIV.D.DE341Haemoglobin (Hb): number in g/dLInvestigations ordered - Haemoglobin (Hb): number in g/dL
    HIV.D.DE342Syphilis rapid plasma reagin (RPR/TPHA): see Syphilis test resultInvestigations ordered - Syphilis rapid plasma reagin (RPR/TPHA): see Syphilis test result
    HIV.D.DE343Chest X-ray (CXR): Free textInvestigations ordered - Chest X-ray (CXR): Free text
    HIV.D.DE344Sputum or culture (general TB): see “TB status” Xpert: see “TB status”Investigations ordered - Sputum or culture (general TB): see “TB status” Xpert: see “TB status”
    HIV.D.DE345HBsAg test (HBV)Investigations ordered - HBsAg test (HBV)
    HIV.D.DE346HIV viral load test orderedInvestigations ordered - HIV viral load test ordered
    HIV.D.DE347CD4 count orderedInvestigations ordered - CD4 count ordered

name: InvestigationsorderedCodes
title: Investigations ordered Codes
description: Codes representing possible values for the Investigations ordered element

concept.display: Syphilis rapid plasma reagin (RPR/TPHA): see Syphilis test result
Sputum or culture (general TB): see “TB status” Xpert: see “TB status”
